description.value:
Many humans thrive in racially diverse metropolitan areas, and some individuals are adopted by members of a different species. Humans with this species trait acquire a deep understanding of their adopted culture and gain a +2 species bonus to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.LeZmnFwnlB89ovBB]{Culture} checks to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.VWJLbwCeu7DsunHk]{Recall Knowledge} about non-humans and to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.aayAhTaRzitONs5U]{Disguise} checks to appear as a humanoid of another race.

This replaces skilled.

modifiers.name: Adopted
modifiers.notes: Humans with this species trait acquire a deep understanding of their adopted culture and gain a +2 species bonus to  Culture checks to  Recall Knowledge about non-humans and to  Disguise checks to appear as a humanoid of another race.
